column4: help! i have an nvidia card and cannot change my resolution.. prprietary drivers don't work right:( i'm also a noob
You do not appear to be using the NVIDIA X driver.  Please edit your X configuration file (just run `nvidia-xconfig` as root), and restart the X server.
does anyone know anything about nvidia and ubuntu and how to get them working together?
depends on the card. If it's 2+ years old, nvidia isn't supporting it, meaning ubuntu can't
